message.p: Click on a tile and type to fill in the Swedish puzzle.

ul.li: Use \ or ` to quickly switch between horizontal and vertical
Use + to zoom in, - to zoom out, or = to set the zoom to 100%
Backspace deletes a character before the cursor, and moves the cursor back
Delete clears the current cell, but keeps the cursor in the same place
In addition to clicking, you can use the arrow keys to navigate the puzzle
Use CTRL+Z to undo your last change
